pages.text: The Ritual of Reparare automatically repairs items stored in an inventory above the master ritual stone. This ritual is perfect for maintaining your tools and equipment without manual intervention.

pages.title: How It Works
pages.text: Place a chest or any inventory directly above the master ritual stone. The ritual will periodically scan the inventory and repair damaged items.$(br2)Repair Rate:$(br)- Repairs 20% of each item's maximum durability per cycle$(br)- Example: Diamond pickaxe (1561 durability) repairs 313 points/cycle$(br)- Runs every 5 seconds (100 ticks)$(br)- Costs 50 LP per damage point repaired

pages.title: Blacklist Tag
pages.text: The ritual respects the animus:disallow_repair item tag. Items in this tag will not be repaired by the ritual.$(br2)This is the same blacklist used by the Sigil of Reparare, allowing consistent behavior across both features.

pages.title: Configuration
pages.text: The Ritual of Reparare can be configured via the server config:$(br)- Repair Interval: Ticks between repairs (default: 100 / 5 seconds)$(br)- LP Cost: LP per damage point repaired (default: 50)$(br2)Repair Amount: Fixed at 20% of max durability$(br2)Activation Cost: 5000 LP

pages.title: Ritual Structure
pages.text: The Ritual of Reparare uses a simple cross pattern with water and earth runes. Place an inventory above the master ritual stone to begin repairs.
